text: The flowmap to color SOP converts the flowmap data to vertex colors

The flowmap to color SOP converts the flowmap data to vertex colors, which is useful for baking to texture or as encoded vertex data. The tool internally converts the flowmap data to the correct tangent space as well.
This allows you to invert the green channel of the flowmap colors, which is required for it to work in Unity.
